description: Each permutation in the list A060117 converted to Site Swap notation, with "zero throws" (fixed elements) replaced with n, the length of siteswap.
maple: Perm2SiteSwap1 := proc(p) local ip,n,i,a; n := nops(p); ip := convert(invperm(convert(p,'disjcyc')),'permlist',n); a := []; for i from 1 to n do a := [op(a),((ip[i]-i) mod n)]; od; RETURN(a); end;SiteSwap1ToDec := proc(s) local i,z,n; n := nops(s); z := 0; for i from 1 to n do z := 10*z; if(0 = s[i]) then z := z+n; else z := z+s[i]; fi; od; RETURN(z); end;
crossrefs: Cf. factorial base representation A007623 and A060496, A006694.
See also A060498, A060499, A061417. Average of digits gives number of balls: A060501.
author: Antti Karttunen, Mar 21 2001
